vip_program.name: Selah Circle
vip_program.description: A three-tier VIP program designed to reward Selah's most loyal customers with exclusive benefits and personalized experiences.

tiers.name: Selah Select
tiers.qualification: 2+ purchases within 90 days OR $150+ total spend
benefits: Early access to new collections (24 hours)
Free standard shipping on all orders

tiers.name: Selah Signature
tiers.qualification: 4+ purchases within 90 days OR $350+ total spend
benefits: Early access to new collections (48 hours)
Free expedited shipping on all orders

tiers.name: Selah Sovereign
tiers.qualification: 6+ purchases within 90 days OR $750+ total spend
benefits: Early access to new collections (72 hours)
Free priority shipping on all orders

tasks: Segment existing customers into appropriate tiers based on purchase history
Develop email templates for tier welcome communications
Configure backend systems for tier tracking and benefits
Train customer service team on program details
Implement early access functionality for new collections
Configure shipping rules for tier-based benefits
Develop birthday gift selection and fulfillment process
Create exclusive product collections for each tier
Implement tier progression notifications and celebrations
Create dashboard for customers to track their tier status and benefits
Develop mobile app integration for tier status and benefits
Implement predictive analytics for tier progression opportunities
Create referral program with tier-based rewards
Develop exclusive events platform for Sovereign tier

data_sources.shopify: Customer purchase history, order values, and product preferences from 25,684 orders
data_sources.klaviyo: Email engagement data from 42,845 profiles across 156 campaigns
data_sources.amplitude: Website behavior patterns from 1.48+ million events
